Posts.Content: i am a candidate for lumpectomy and the IORT. i am very excited to have this option but would like to talk to someone who had had it done and what the post op effects are with this kind of radiation tx. s
Posts.Title: anyone have the IORT?

Posts.Content: compression sleeve, and Elavil and Neurontin?  i am 6 weeks post op mastectomy with 10 node dissection. my pain has decrease to nearly a zero! every day since surgery there was noticable improvement. i hope this gives you hope.  :-)
Posts.Title: after an operation
